mapper.insert: insert into file_pair_commit (repository_id, commit_id, file_name1, file_name2, file_pair) values (#{repositoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePair,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into file_pair_commit
repository_id,
commit_id,
file_name1,
file_name2,
file_pair,
